message.body: My gas station totally has the thing that holds down the pump!!!
Omfg totally illegal. You badass.
Another guy was doing it too! At Hess!
Peer pressure...

Ohhhh okay we have clarified. I thought you meant the lever didn't exist in the first place. Both the other guy and I stood outside by the pump- is it just illegal to get in the car while its pumping?
Idk. In a lot of places the lever actually DOESN'T exist, but some keep it installed I guess. I don't think it makes a difference if you get back in the car.
Annnnnnaaaa!
Awkward whale!!! Btw this is Anna <3
HEY FRIEND!
DEEELLLLLAAAA!!!!!
How are you, child?
I am... At a funeral, actually. But I'm seeing my whole dad's side of the family so it's nice
My dad's cousin. I didn't know him very well. But it was honestly like 5 hours to get here and will be 5 hours back.
:( who's funeral?
Panda hugs are the best hugs! How are you liking MA?
That sucks
It's been really fun for the couple days I have been here
I'll be around pretty much all the time except for today. When's good for you?
What are doing for New Years? We are doing first night in Boston if you want to come.
Wow really? I hadn't really made plans yet... That would be so fun :)
Hey it's Liza. Have you done it before? Is there somewhere you can get a pin in your town? Anna says of course really and we'd love for you to come! My (Liza's) friend is probably coming too
My brother did it last year or something, so I could probably figure out what I need to do... I don't really know how it works.
But that sounds awesome. Is it your Indian friend? =P
This is Anna: YAY!!! Yes, it is her Indian friend. Her name is Neelima.
Cool! Is she Liza's age? Can I see if a friend of mine wants to come?
Yes and yes
Cooool :D
Yeah, this funeral is in upstate NY so we stopped there on the way.
Wait who we're you at reins with? Family?
Ahh makes sense. Had your family already heard of it?
Yeah apparently I've been there before. I still don't remember though...
